DOC.brief_summary: The objective present study evaluate whether vortioxetine ( 10 20 mg/day ) least effective agomelatine ( 25 50 mg/day ) patient depressive symptom show inadequate response Serotonin Reuptake Inhibitors ( SRI ) antidepressant .
DOC.brief_title: A Study Vortioxetine ( Lu AA21004 ) Comparison Agomelatine Adults Suffering From Major Depression With Inadequate Response Previous Medication
DOC.criteria: The patient treat serotonin reuptake inhibitor ( SRI ) antidepressant ( monotherapy ) prescribe treat Major Depressive Episode ( DSMIVTR criterion ) The response current SRI treatment inadequate patient agree discontinue current SRI baseline Montgomery Åsberg Depression Rating Scale ( MADRS ) total score ≥22 Screening Visit Baseline The patient , woman , must : agree try become pregnant study , AND use adequate , highly effective contraception The patient current Axis I disorder ( DSMIV criterion ) Major Depressive Disorder ( MDD ) , General Anxiety Disorder ( GAD ) Social Anxiety Disorder ( SAD ) The patient significant risk suicide The patient currently receive formal psychotherapy psychoactive medication Other protocoldefined inclusion exclusion criterion may apply .
